Computer.name: HW Server Farm #103
Computer.file:
You've successfully connected to the first Capture the Flag server. You will find an encrypted file in the /home folder. From here, you are looking to get access to the file contents within. The password will be one of the passwords you were given before.
HINT: You will probably need to think of this order if you want to beat the other team: 1_3_3_2
Computer.encryptedFile:
Congratulation on breaking the encryption of the first file. But this is just one of many...
Your next set of passwords are: (once again, without the quotation marks) - "w0rld" - "h4ndl3" - "w1r3d"
